mapper.select:
SELECT OBJ_ID ,SITE_ID ,WORK_ID ,JOB_SEQ_ID ,LOT_ID ,SUB_PROD_MTRL_ID ,SUB_PROD_MTRL_STRT_TM ,SUB_PROD_MTRL_END_TM ,CELL_GRD_CD ,EVNT_NM ,PREV_EVNT_NM ,CSTM_EVNT_NM ,PREV_CSTM_EVNT_NM ,USE_STAT_CD ,RSN_CD ,TRNS_CM ,CRT_USER_ID ,CRT_DT ,MDFY_USER_ID ,MDFY_DT ,FNL_EVNT_DT ,TID FROM WN_WORK_JOB_CELL_INFO
OBJ_ID = #{objId}, SITE_ID = #{siteId}, WORK_ID = #{workId}, JOB_SEQ_ID = #{jobSeqId}, LOT_ID = #{lotId},
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO WH_WORK_JOB_CELL_INFO ( OBJ_ID ,REF_OBJ_ID ,SITE_ID ,WORK_ID ,JOB_SEQ_ID ,LOT_ID ,SUB_PROD_MTRL_ID ,SUB_PROD_MTRL_STRT_TM ,SUB_PROD_MTRL_END_TM ,CELL_GRD_CD ,EVNT_NM ,PREV_EVNT_NM ,CSTM_EVNT_NM ,PREV_CSTM_EVNT_NM ,USE_STAT_CD ,RSN_CD ,TRNS_CM ,CRT_USER_ID ,CRT_DT ,MDFY_USER_ID ,MDFY_DT ,FNL_EVNT_DT ,TID ) SELECT (SELECT TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISSFF6') || '-' || SYS_GUID() FROM DUAL) AS OBJ_ID ,OBJ_ID AS REF_OBJ_ID ,SITE_ID ,WORK_ID ,JOB_SEQ_ID ,LOT_ID ,SUB_PROD_MTRL_ID ,SUB_PROD_MTRL_STRT_TM ,SUB_PROD_MTRL_END_TM ,CELL_GRD_CD ,EVNT_NM ,PREV_EVNT_NM ,CSTM_EVNT_NM ,PREV_CSTM_EVNT_NM ,USE_STAT_CD ,RSN_CD ,TRNS_CM ,CRT_USER_ID ,CRT_DT ,MDFY_USER_ID ,MDFY_DT ,FNL_EV FROM WN_WORK_JOB_CELL_INFO WHERE OBJ_ID = #{objId}
